quote: If a dog jumps in your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because your lap is warmer.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: It's funny how dogs and cats know the inside of folks better than other folks do, isn't it?
author: Eleanor H. Porter

quote: Cats and monkeys; monkeys and cats; all human life is there.
author: Henry James

quote: Cats regard people as warmblooded furniture.
author: Jacquelyn Mitchard

quote: Cats are smarter than dogs. You can't get eight cats to pull a sled through snow.
author: Jeff Valdez

quote: Nature abhors a vacuum, but not as much as cats do.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Of all God's creatures there is only one that cannot be made the slave of the lash. That one is the cat. If man could be crossed with cat it would improve man, but it would deteriorate the cat.
author: Sir Winston Churchill

quote: I like pigs. Dogs look up to us. Cats look down on us. Pigs treat us as equals.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: "I meant," said Ipslore bitterly, "what is there in this world that truly makes living worthwhile?" Death thought about it. "Cats," he said eventually. "Cats are nice."
author: Unknown

quote: Cats are intended to teach us that not everything in nature has a function.
